comment: Example credentials file - Make a copy of this file named credentials_dev.json with your test login info
clientId: Take the client Id from salesforce connected App consumer key and copy paste here
clientSecret: Take the consumer secret from salesforce connected app consumer key and copy paste here
username: Add salesforce username which you are using for login of sandbox environment of salesforce
password: Add salesforce password which you are using for login of sandbox environment of salesforce
